loan.name: Alex
loan.use: to buy fertilizers and mulch for his farm to have better yields.
loan.description:
Alex is married with three children, two of whom attend school. He does farming, mainly banana growing as his main source of income. Given that farming is a seasonal business, he saved up some money that he invested in a small bar to supplement his income.

He works from Monday to Sunday. Alex is a true hard worker who struggles tirelessly to make his dream of having his own home and living a dignified life a reality.

He is asking for a loan to invest in his farming business to buy fertilizers and mulch. Alex is positive that he will have a good harvest, which will bring in more income for the family's survival.

Alex appreciates the support.
loan.whySpecial: It helps rural farmers to increase productivity and their income.
